telephone_number.description: Phone number in any common format. Strip spaces/hyphens if needed.

policy_number.description: The unique identifier for the policy.

coverage_type.description: Type of insurance coverage (e.g., Homeowners, Auto, Renters).

policy_effective_date.description: Policy start date. Must be normalized as YYYY‑MM‑DD.

damage_deductible.description: Deductible amount in numeric form (strip $ and commas).
